channel.title: How to read files and return value to string
channel.description:
Ok for expample, if I text document like this:
Benny Johny Lukey
I need to read and return line 1, (benny) as string - Username1. And like line 2 (Johny) as another string called Username2 etc..
Anyone Know How To Do This?
